word: the national park of american samoa

body_content.explanation: a national park (= a large area of land protected by the government because of its natural beauty or because it has a special history) in the US territory of American Samoa:
examples: The National Park of American Samoa welcomes you into the heart of the South Pacific, to a world of sights, sounds, and experiences that you will find in no other national park in the United States.
The National Park of American Samoa is home to over 35 resident and migratory species, including seabirds, water birds, forest birds, and shorebirds.
